quote: You will do as you are told the second you are told to do it. Is that clear?''I'm not six mother, I think I can grasp standard sentences.' Whether I chose to pay attention to them however...
quote_letters: YOU WILL DO AS YOU ARE TOLD THE SECOND YOU ARE TOLD TO DO IT IS THAT CLEARIM NOT SIX MOTHER I THINK I CAN GRASP STANDARD SENTENCES WHETHER I CHOSE TO PAY ATTENTION TO THEM HOWEVER
